title: Tech baseball to make Tuesday homecoming against Marshall - VT hokiesports.com
content: Tech baseball to make Tuesday homecoming against Marshall  VT hokiesports.com
description: After pocketing two top-20 road wins during its historic weekend in Chapel Hill, the Virginia Tech baseball team (17-7) will make its Blacksburg homecoming for the first time in two weeks on Tuesday, April 5, when Tech entertains Marshall (13-14-1) at English Field at Atlantic Union Bank Park.
